sentence: The complete poll results: Mehmet Oz: 27.4% David McCormick: 15.9% Carla Sands: 14.8% Kathy Barnette: 8.9% Jeff Bartos: 6.6% Sean Gale: 1.9% George Bochetto: 1.6% Everett Stern: 1.5% There were still 21.6% of likely GOP Senate primary voters undecided.
author: Eric Mack
title: Trafalgar Poll: Dr. Oz Takes Big Lead in Pa. Race

sentence: Monday's debate did not include high profile candidates such as the celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz and former George W Bush official David McCormick, both of whom took flak for skipping the event.
author: Io Dodds
title: Republican candidate denounces Michael Flynn as a ‘traitor’ during bad-tempered GOP debate

author: Paul Muschick
title: Dr. Oz, other carpetbaggers insulted Pennsylvania voters by skipping Senate debate
